ing: 14 ounces smoked sausage (such as Healthy ChoiceÂ®), quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/4-inch pieces
n: Slow Cooker Red Beans and Rice Soup
des: "If you love the flavors of red beans and rice, combine the ingredients to make a filling and healthy soup!"
ins:
Combine water, sausage, kidney beans, onion, celery, chicken bouillon, Cajun seasoning, garlic salt, and thyme in a slow cooker.
Cook on High for 4 hours. Add rice and cook until rice is tender, about 1 hour more.
